extra_site_info: Yes, itâ€™s OSD sampling site ID OSD81, annually sampled in OSD2014, OSD2015, OSD2016, OSD2018, OSD2019, and 12x monthly series of OSD2020. Is near the UALG experimental station Ramalhete. The site is a channel of a lagunar system and sampling always take place with out going current (lowering tide).
